All spring, summer and fall study abroad and study away programming has been canceled for calendar year 2020.

Pittâ€™s Study Abroad Office will be in contact with affected students and faculty, and Jeff Whitehead (whitehead@pitt.edu) is the point of contact for study abroad and study away programming.
